DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy treatment radial shockwave myofascial pain syndrome lumbar region compare placebo questionnaire image exam .
DOC.brief_title: Radial Extracorporeal Shock Wave Treatment ( rESWT ) Myofascial Pain Syndrome Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: Presenting clinical complaint lumbar / gluteal pain 3 month Display pain moderate severe intensity : visual analogue scale ( VAS ) > 4 Diagnosis myofascial pain syndrome lumbar / gluteal Authorize write term free inform consent participate study Availability frequent attendance hospital Organic psychological disorder contraindication participation patient study Metabolic , infectious , oncological rheumatologic disorder Fibromyalgia Labor dispute Indication surgery column Contraindications therapy shock wave : Coagulopathy / anticoagulant Pregnancy Acute infection soft tissue bone Systemic Infections Presence ulcer treatment sit Presence large vessels nerve treatment sit Polyneuropathies Malignancies Cardiac arrhythmia use pacemaker Epilepsy
